desc: Class and functional components. React Hooks. State management and dynamic updates. Async API calls
Event Listeners, DOM Manipulation, Object Methods, ES6 Syntax, OOP and Data Structures, Logic Programming, UI and Experience Programming
AJAX Methods, Selectors, jQuery style functions. DOM manipulation and creation.
Using the grid system and builtin classes to quickly protype and customize responsive, user-first websites and applications.

When forming the backbone of the front-end experience. I look to create a HTML/CSS application which makes sense to other developers as well as to users. By keeping things modular, clear, commented and ordered.
Sites I have built revolve around the Express Framework and NPM modules such as Passport, Body-Parser, EJS and others. I have created a NPM project called cls -- see project page for more detail

I have built a number of artistic and personal projects using Python and Flask. I am passionate about OpenCV, Flask, Tkinter, PyGame and front end frameworks to craft GUI and web apps capable of some more intense number or data crunching.
Using CSS preprocessors allows me to create more complex functionality to the CSS within an app while making code more readable and functional.

Through my artistic practice I have used IoT and embedded solutions for video playback, sculpture, data processing and as servers for dynamic sites. I am competent and comfortable working with and debugging these systems.
Generating animations and graphics using JavaScript and Java frameworks.
